statements: SELECT * FROM Documents WHERE document_type = 'Report';
SELECT id, document_name, author FROM Documents WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT document_name, publication_date FROM Documents WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, document_name, author, publication_date FROM Documents ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, author, publication_date FROM Documents WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Documents ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM Documents WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT document_name, author FROM Documents WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date
SELECT id, document_name, publication_date FROM Documents WHERE document_type = 'Proposal' LIMIT 10
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as num_documents FROM Documents GROUP BY author HAVING num_documents > 2
SELECT title, author, year FROM Documentation;
SELECT * FROM Documentation WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT author, title FROM Documentation WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, content FROM Documentation ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT id, title, author, year, content FROM Documentation WHERE author='John Doe' ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Documentation WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT author, title, content FROM Documentation WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' AND year > 2000 ORDER BY title, year DESC
SELECT id, author, year FROM Documentation WHERE year < 2000 AND title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY author ASC
SELECT * FROM Documentation INNER JOIN Tags ON Documentation.id = Tags.tag_id WHERE Tags.tag_name='Database' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM RepairManuals;
SELECT title, author FROM RepairManuals WHERE published_year > 2000;
SELECT id, title, author, published_year FROM RestorationGuides WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, editor, published_year FROM CarMagazines WHERE issue_number = 100;
SELECT id, title, published_year FROM CarMagazines ORDER BY published_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM RepairManuals WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT title, published_year FROM RestorationGuides WHERE published_year > 2000 ORDER BY published_year DESC;
SELECT id, title, author FROM CarMagazines WHERE editor = 'Jane Doe' AND issue_number > 10;
SELECT title, author, published_year FROM RepairManuals WHERE published_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY published_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM CarMagazines ORDER BY published_year, issue_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM Repair_Manuals;
SELECT manual_name, car_model FROM Repair_Manuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT publication_date, manual_name FROM Repair_Manuals ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT guide_name FROM Restoration_Guides WHERE car_make = 'Ford' AND publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, magazine_name FROM Vintage_Car_Magazines WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT id, manual_name, car_model FROM Repair_Manuals WHERE car_model='BMW' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT guide_name, publication_date FROM Restoration_Guides WHERE car_make='Ford' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT magazine_name, publication_date FROM Vintage_Car_Magazines WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, search_term, documentation_type, document_title FROM Searchable_Database WHERE search_term='vintage cars' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, magazine_name, publication_date FROM Vintage_Car_Magazines WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RepairManuals;
SELECT car_model, publication_date FROM RestorationGuides ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT magazine_title, publisher, publication_date FROM CarMagazines WHERE publisher = 'Car News' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM Favorites WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM RepairManuals WHERE car_model = 'Toyota Camry';
SELECT manual_id, car_model, publication_date FROM RepairManuals WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT guide_title, car_make FROM RestorationGuides WHERE car_make = 'Ford';
SELECT magazine_title, publication_date FROM CarMagazines WHERE publisher = 'CarMag';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
